comments:
On 3.1.2
To reproduce: 
- create a plugin with a  dependency on o.e.pde.build
- add a dep on o.e.ant.core
- add a an extension o.e.antTypes
- add an antType in this extension
- in the dropdown for the "headless field" select true
- delete this selection to erase "true"
- try to save: you get a pop-up: "Saved failed: index out of bounds"  and the following error log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 2 0 2006-02-10 18:00:48.515
